column1: #Text=Aang says : " And this is how they do it in the ballrooms of Ba Sing Se . "
#Text=Sokka says : " Wow , they look pretty good together . "
#Text=Katara says : " Eh , if that 's what you like ... " Aang says : " Yeah , that 's it !
#Text=These shoes are n't really right for dancing , and I - I 'm not sure that I know how to - " Aang says : " Take my hand .
#Text=" Aang says : " Do n't worry about them .
#Text=It 's just you and me right now .
#Text=" Headmaster says : " It is a dancing party .
#Text=You did the right thing by telling me , Hide .
#Text=" Male student # 1 says : " This is incredible !
#Text=" Headmaster says : " He 's the one we want !
